showScoreExcerpt:
"The musical did a beautiful job of incorporating the story with the dynamic music of Gloria through her chart-topping, smash hits...Humor, pathos and passion bookended by small domestic scenes and full-blown productions including a showstopping dance down the aisles of the theatre at the end of act one--kept the audience right where they wanted them--in their hands--and at times--on their feet!"
